name: smite LLM Interactive Guide
description: Comprehensive LLM-optimized documentation for the smite (Single Molecule Imaging Toolbox Extraordinaire) - a MATLAB-based toolbox for fluorescence single molecule imaging analysis with emphasis on SMLM and SPT

categories.title: Getting Started
categories.description: Essential guides for new users to quickly start using smite for single molecule analysis

categories.title: Core Concepts
categories.description: Fundamental architecture, data structures, and design patterns that define smite

categories.title: Workflows
categories.description: Complete step-by-step workflows for major analysis pipelines including SMLM, SPT, and batch processing

categories.title: How-To Guides
categories.description: Practical, task-focused guides for specific operations and configurations

categories.title: Examples
categories.description: Working code examples demonstrating common and advanced analysis scenarios

categories.title: API Reference
categories.description: Detailed namespace and class documentation for programmatic access

categories.title: Reference
categories.description: Technical reference materials including data structures, file formats, and dependencies

categories.title: Troubleshooting
categories.description: Solutions to common problems, errors, and optimization issues

documents.title: Quick Start Guide
documents.summary: Fast-track introduction to running your first SMLM analysis in under 10 minutes

documents.title: Installation and Setup
documents.summary: Complete installation instructions including MATLAB setup, GPU configuration, and dependency verification

documents.title: Your First Analysis
documents.summary: Step-by-step tutorial for performing your first complete SMLM analysis from raw data to super-resolution image

documents.title: Understanding Your Results
documents.summary: Guide to interpreting SMLM results including SMD structure, precision metrics, and output files

documents.title: Architecture Overview
documents.summary: Complete overview of smite's architecture including namespace organization, design philosophy, and component relationships

documents.title: SMF Structure Deep Dive
documents.summary: Comprehensive guide to the SingleMoleculeFitting structure that controls all analysis parameters

documents.title: SMD Structure Reference
documents.summary: Complete reference for the SingleMoleculeData structure containing localization results

documents.title: TR Structure for Tracking
documents.summary: Guide to the Tracking Results structure used for single particle tracking analysis

documents.title: Coordinate System and Conventions
documents.summary: Explanation of smite's coordinate system, indexing conventions, and spatial reference frames

documents.title: Data Flow Through Pipelines
documents.summary: Visual and textual explanation of how data flows through SMLM and SPT pipelines

documents.title: Complete SMLM Analysis Workflow
documents.summary: Comprehensive guide to the complete SMLM analysis pipeline from raw data to super-resolution images

documents.title: Single Particle Tracking Workflow
documents.summary: Complete workflow for tracking single particles through time and analyzing their motion

documents.title: Batch Processing with smi.Publish
documents.summary: Comprehensive guide to batch processing multiple datasets using the smi.Publish class with standard directory structures

documents.title: Drift Correction in SMLM
documents.summary: Comprehensive guide to correcting stage drift during long SMLM acquisitions using fiducial-free and brightfield-based methods

documents.title: Frame Connection for SMLM Blinking Analysis
documents.summary: Comprehensive guide to frame connection, which links localizations across frames from the same blinking emitter to improve precision and reduce data size

documents.title: BaGoL Clustering Workflow
documents.summary: Bayesian Grouping of Localizations workflow for determining true emitter positions

documents.title: Multi-Channel Registration
documents.summary: Guide to registering and aligning multi-channel SMLM data

documents.title: ROI-Based Analysis
documents.summary: Workflow for analyzing specific regions of interest within SMLM data

documents.title: How to Load Data
documents.summary: Practical guide to loading raw camera data from .h5 and .mat files into smite

documents.title: How to Localize Molecules
documents.summary: Detailed guide to finding and fitting molecules to obtain precise localizations

documents.title: Creating and Configuring SMF
documents.summary: Step-by-step guide to creating and configuring SingleMoleculeFitting structures

documents.title: Camera Calibration
documents.summary: Guide to camera calibration including gain, offset, and noise characterization

documents.title: Thresholding Localizations
documents.summary: How to filter localizations based on quality metrics and custom criteria

documents.title: Visualizing Results
documents.summary: Guide to creating super-resolution images and diagnostic plots

documents.title: Saving and Loading Results
documents.summary: How to save and load SMD structures and analysis results

documents.title: Exporting Results
documents.summary: How to export results to various formats for external analysis

documents.title: Tuning Analysis Parameters
documents.summary: Systematic approach to optimizing analysis parameters for your data

documents.title: Simulating SMLM Data
documents.summary: How to generate synthetic SMLM and SPT data for testing and validation

documents.title: Using GPU Acceleration
documents.summary: Guide to configuring and using GPU acceleration for localization

documents.title: Working with ROIs
documents.summary: How to define, apply, and analyze regions of interest

documents.title: Combining Multiple Datasets
documents.summary: How to combine localizations from multiple datasets

documents.title: Basic Localization Example
documents.summary: Simple complete example of loading data and localizing molecules

documents.title: Multi-Channel SMLM Example
documents.summary: Example of analyzing and overlaying multi-channel SMLM data

documents.title: Tracking and Diffusion Analysis Example
documents.summary: Complete example of single particle tracking and diffusion coefficient estimation

documents.title: 3D Localization with Astigmatism
documents.summary: Example of 3D localization using astigmatic PSF

documents.title: Clustering Analysis Example
documents.summary: Example of performing clustering analysis on SMLM results

documents.title: smi Namespace Overview
documents.summary: Overview of the main smi namespace and its entry-point classes

documents.summary: Complete reference for core functionality classes in smi_core namespace

documents.summary: Reference for visualization and image generation tools

documents.summary: Guide to navigating the smite API and finding the right tools

documents.summary: Documentation of all file formats used by smite

documents.summary: Complete list of dependencies, toolboxes, and system requirements

documents.summary: Guide to compiling mex and CUDA files from source

documents.summary: Guide to the testing framework and running unit tests

documents.summary: Solutions to common installation and setup problems

documents.summary: Diagnosing and fixing GPU-related problems

documents.summary: Diagnosing and improving poor localization quality

documents.title: Common Mistakes
documents.summary: Common mistakes users make and how to avoid them

usage_instructions.for_llms: This manifest provides a structured index of all smite documentation. When helping users, reference specific documents by their 'path' field. Use 'prerequisites' to guide learning paths and 'related' for cross-references. The 'summary' field provides quick context for each document.
usage_instructions.for_humans: Browse documents by category. Start with 'getting-started' for basics, then explore 'workflows' for complete pipelines. Use 'how-to' guides for specific tasks and 'troubleshooting' when you encounter problems. The 'api-reference' section provides detailed technical documentation.
